title: Plan to unmask 400 m Net users
content: http://china.globaltimes.cn/society/2010-05/528534.html Plan to unmask 400 m Net users * Source: Global Times * [01:53 May 05 2010] By An Baijie China’s 400 million Internet users may soon be required to reveal their actual names before they log on to online forums and share their views on new films, luxury jails or the price of pork, all in a move to make the Internet more reputable.
